Titles.eng: Naruto Shippūden the Movie: The Will of Fire
Titles.jpn: 劇場版 NARUTO -ナルト- 疾風伝 火の意志を継ぐ者

Summaries.eng: Four Kekkei Genkai shinobi who have been guarding the Hidden Cloud, Stone, Mist and Sand villages disappear without a trace. The Land of Fire comes under suspicion, as it is the only country to have suffered no losses. Mounting suspicion among the four nations is bringing them to the brink of another Great Ninja War. In the Hidden Leaf Village, Tsunade orders her forces to prevent anything from happening that would lead to war, while also trying to discover the truth.
